activities: Tenrox customers may opt to include personal identifiable information(PII) in their application instance. Tenrox web based enterprise project management software is a modular solution that helps simplify your, project planning, project tracking, project accounting, expense tracking, enterprise resource / capacity planning, and time and billing. Tenrox does not control the information entered and does not use it for any purpose other then customer support as needed.
